title: The Trap
creator_credit: Alfred Socolow, Leo Trachtenberg and Harvest Films
brief_description: Interviews conducted with people who have been injured in the work place by ignoring safety procedures. In-depth accounts of the consequences of incidents that have left workers disabled and scarred by these traumatic events. Re-enactments of accidents that have occurred in the work place, reinforcing the practice of safety procedures.
